arts.ttl: Bahoya and Uzun hope Heidenheim win will spur them on to defeat Tottenham on Thursday
arts.sum: Two of Die Adler's up and coming young talents spoke to the press at full-time.

arts.ttl: "I saw a deserved win for Eintracht" - Heidenheim head coach Schmidt
arts.sum: Heidenheim ebb closer to a relegation play-off after another loss away from home.

arts.ttl: "The win was deserved" - Toppmöller reflects on Frankfurt's defeat of Heidenheim
arts.sum: Die Adler's boss had his say after their comfortable victory over Heidenheim this afternoon in the Hessen state.

arts.ttl: Eintracht Frankfurt cruise to comfortable 3-0 victory over Heidenheim
arts.sum: Eintracht Frankfurt defeated Heidenheim 3-0 in a dominant display, with goals from Jean-Mattéo Bahoya, Robin Koch, and Hugo Ekitiké, solidifying their position in the race for UEFA Champions League football next season. Frankfurt's early pressure paid off just minutes later, however, when Bahoya finished off a slick team move, slotting home from close range after good work from Hugo Ekitiké and Chaïbi in the 10th minute.

arts.ttl: Frankfurt make light work of struggling Heidenheim
arts.sum: Eintracht Frankfurt put a seal on Bundesliga Matchday 29 with a 3-0 win over Heidenheim.

arts.ttl: Ange Postecoglou gives update on Son Heung-min's fitness ahead of Eintracht Frankfurt clash after Tottenham captain misses defeat at Wolves
arts.sum: Ange Postecoglou has provided an update on the fitness of Tottenham captain Son Heung-min. Son wasn't included in the matchday squad as Tottenham were beaten 4-2 by Wolves .

arts.ttl: Eintracht Frankfurt vs. Heidenheim preview: Die Adler continue UCL push
arts.sum: Eintracht Frankfurt will continue their quest to secure Champions League qualification when they welcome Heidenheim to Deutsche Bank Park for Sunday’s Bundesliga contest.

arts.ttl: Preview: Eintracht Frankfurt vs. Heidenheim - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Sunday's Bundesliga clash between Eintracht Frankfurt and Heidenheim, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
